meanings.definition: Relating to the uvea, the pigmented middle layer of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The uveal layer protects the eye from harmful light.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the uveal tract during the eye check-up.
meanings.sent3: The uveal shield defended the eye like a brave knight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the uveal layer of a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the uveal layer made the eye mesmerizing.
